paper_abstract: The HPC Challenge (HPCC) Benchmark Suite and the Intel MPI Benchmark (IMB) are used to compare and evaluate the combined performance of processor, memory subsystem and interconnect fabric of five leading supercornputers-SGI Affix BX2, Cray X1, Cray Opteron Cluster, Dell Xeon Cluster, and NEC SX-8. These five systems use live different networks (SGI NUMALINK4, Cray network, Myrinet, InfiniBand, and NEC IXS). The complete set of HPCC Benchmarks are run oil each of these systems. Additionally, we present Intel MPI Benchmarks results to study the performance of I I MPI communication functions on these systems. (C) 2007 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Performance evaluation of supercomputers using HPCC and IMB benchmarks
